thread.section_title: CoolFrames.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CoolFrames.com | www.coolframes.com
thread.title: Out of pocket
thread.title_full: CoolFrames.com reviewed by Out of pocket

author: Out of pocket
title: Out of pocket
text: I was already frustrated by the postage taking so long (but this was the fault of the UK postal service not the sender), but then had to pay an extra fee for the glasses, this should have already been accounted for. They were helpful when I enquired about my item, but I do not appreciate hidden charges.
